link_desc:
Introduction

Template Net Digisol DG-GS4524 SNMPv2

Tested on Zabbix 4.4 with DG-GS4524 running 1.2.0.11 software

May work on other badged Edge-core (https://www.edge-core.com/) switches including models from:

  • Black Box
  • SMC
  • Supermicro
  • TP-link
  • Transition networks

Created by full clone of Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv2 then:

  • Application prototypes: removed (by editing .xml)
  • Linked templates: removed all except Template Module Generic SNMPv2
  • Items: added
    • Hardware version
    • Software version
    • System serial number
  • Discovery
    • Rule OID: added {#IFALIAS}
    • Item, Trigger and Graph prototypes:
      Changed {#IFDESCR} to {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS})
  • Merged Template Module EtherLike-MIB SNMPv2
    • Changed {#SNMPVALUE} to {#IFDUPSTATUS}
    • Item prototype: changed application to Network interfaces

Installation

Administration > General > Macros: SNMP_COMMUNITY

Download the file (link below).

Configuration > Templates > Import > browse to the downloaded file > Import

Configure a host > Templates > Link new templates > search for Template Net Digisol DG-GS4524 SNMPv2 > Add

Bugs

None identified
